remarks: Substitution distributes over concatenation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
statement:
mrsubccat.s $e |- S = ( mRSubst ` T ) $.
mrsubccat.r $e |- R = ( mREx ` T ) $.
mrsubccat $p |- ( ( F e. ran S /\ X e. R /\ Y e. R ) -> ( F ` ( X concat Y ) ) = ( ( F ` X ) concat ( F ` Y ) ) ) $.
